intro_text: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your personal data when you use the PROMs app.
intro_agreement: By using our app, you agree to the collection and use of your information in accordance with this policy.
patient_data_personal: Personal Information: Name, Date of Birth, Phone Number, Medical Record (MR) Number, and Appointment Details.
patient_data_health: Health Information: PROMs survey responses related to your health status, doctor’s notes, ICD codes, and medical history.
doctor_data_personal: Personal Information: Name, Username, and Password.
doctor_data_patient: Patient Data: Access to assigned patients’ details including personal and health information for analysis and decision-making.
staff_data_personal: Personal Information: Name, Username, and Password.
staff_data_management: Patient Management: Access to patient appointment scheduling, edits, and data uploads.
admin_data_title: 2.4 Hospital Admin and Super Admin Data
admin_data_personal: Personal Information: Name, Username, and Password.
admin_data_management: Hospital Management: Access to manage hospitals, specialties, and staff, and view anonymized hospital-level data.

data_usage_list.1: Facilitate patient-doctor interactions through PROMs surveys.
data_usage_list.2: Enable doctors to view and analyze patient progress.
data_usage_list.3: Provide hospital-level insights for hospital and super admins.
data_usage_list.4: Ensure the proper functioning of the app and improve healthcare outcomes.

legal_basis_list.1: GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation) for users based in the EU.
legal_basis_list.2: HIPAA (Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act) for healthcare-related data in the US.
legal_basis_list.3: Explicit user consent is obtained before processing any personal data.

data_security_list.1: Encryption: All personal data is encrypted both at rest (AES-256) and in transit (SSL/TLS).
data_security_list.2: Access Controls: Role-based access ensures that only authorized personnel can access sensitive information.
data_security_list.3: Audit Logs: All actions are logged for security monitoring and accountability.

data_retention_list.patient: Patient Data: Retained for a minimum of 5 years or as required by local health regulations. After this period, data will be anonymized or securely deleted.
data_retention_list.staff: Staff, Doctor, Admin Data: Retained for the duration of employment or service and deleted 6 months after termination.

data_rights_description: Under the GDPR and HIPAA, you have the following rights:

data_rights_list.access: Access: You may request a copy of your personal data.
data_rights_list.correction: Correction: You can request corrections to inaccurate or incomplete data.
data_rights_list.deletion: Deletion: You can request the deletion of your data where applicable.
data_rights_list.portability: Data Portability: You can request a copy of your data in a portable format.

data_breach_description: In the event of a data breach, we will notify affected users and relevant authorities within 72 hours as required by GDPR and HIPAA.
policy_changes_description: We may update this policy from time to time. You will be notified of any changes via email or through our app.
contact_info_description: For questions or concerns regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
